text: Hagi maka Tairi vahe'ma, Saidoni vahe'ma, Filistia mopafima nemaniza vahe'motanena nahigetma e'inahu zantamina hunantaze? Tamagra mago'a zante nona huta nazeri haviza hu'za nehazo? Tamagrama mago'a zante'ma nona hunanteta nazeri havizama hunaku'ma ana'ma nehanazana, Nagra ame hu'na ana zantamina eri rukrahe hu'na, tamagrira tamazeri haviza hugahue.
